item.title: Dollar Path Splits Goldman, Fidelity Over Emerging-Market Bonds
item.author: Bloomberg News (English)
item.description: (Bloomberg) -- Goldman Sachs Group Inc. says emerging-market investors should favor dollar-denominated bonds over local-currency ones. Fidelity International says the opposite. Goldman argues that dollar debt will outperform as potential US election volatility bolsters the greenback and leads to pol...
